meanings.definition: A person who studies the branch of biology dealing with the functions and activities of living organisms and their parts.
meanings.sent1: The physiologists conducted experiments to understand how the heart functions.
meanings.sent2: Many physiologists work in research labs to learn about how our bodies work.
meanings.sent3: The physiologists were so focused on studying organisms that they forgot to eat lunch.
meanings.sent4: She compared the physiologists to detectives, uncovering the mysteries of the human body.
meanings.sent5: The physiologists' passion for understanding life's processes was truly inspiring.

meanings.definition: Those who specialize in the study of the normal functions of living organisms and their parts.
meanings.sent1: The team of physiologists observed the normal behavior of cells under the microscope.
meanings.sent2: Physiologists play a crucial role in advancing our knowledge of how living things function.
meanings.sent3: The physiologists joked that they were like doctors for plants, diagnosing their health.
meanings.sent4: In her eyes, the physiologists were like conductors orchestrating the symphony of life.
meanings.sent5: The physiologists' dedication to understanding the intricacies of organisms was unmatched.
